body.name: Sooez Original Clipboard with 2 Storage & Pen Holder, Heavy Duty Clip Boards 8.5x11 with Dual Storage, Clearview Dry Erase Coach Clipboard with Real Hinge, High Capacity, School & Office Supplies
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs
features: [Patented Design] Dual Storage & Separate Pen Holder: Pattened dual-Layer design along with the pen/pencil case ensure roomy space for various needs of storage. Keep frequently used documents on the top compartment and store more than 300 sheets in the spacious bottom compartment. Separate pen/pencil case for pens, pencils, markers, clips and other small items.

Truly Heavy Duty: This storage clipboard is probably the strongest one you've ever come across. Made from high-impact, break-resistant plastic that is durable and won’t break and flex easily like our rivals. Compare the weights on Amazon and buy heavier ones. Heavier = Sturdier. You will be amazed by the quality of our clipboard.

Writable & Visible Clear Top Panel: The transparent top section is compatible with dry erase markers (not included) and perfect for writing or reusing the same paper. Keeps your rosters and playlists dry and safe even on bad rainy days and gives you easy access to frequently used documents.
wo Sturdy Latches: Each portion has its own latch, ensuring that when one layer is opened, the other remains closed and stopping paper from falling all over the place.

ulti-functional: Size: 10" w x 1 1/4" d x 14 1/2" h. Serve the same purpose as a briefcase, whiteboard, presentation folder, storage unit for documents. Great for football coaching, truck driver, traveling teacher, homeschooling, outside sports, and etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: - Are you tired of crumpled paper? - Always looking for a great way to reuse diagrams? - Where'd your pen go? Well, throw all of those headaches away and lock down Sooez’s Dry Erase Clipboard with Dual Compartment. Sooez storage clipboard will keep your documents in good condition with its rugged construction. The clear top section surface is also dry-erase convenience for temporary notes. The dual-layer design along with the pen/pencil case ensures roomy space for various needs storage. Specification: - Package Included: 1 x Sooez Dry Erase Clipboard box (dry erase marker / templates are not included) - Material: Durable polypropylene - Clipboard Actual Size: 9.8" w x 1 1/3" d x 14 1/4" h - Holds Paper Size: 8 1/2" x 11" or A4 size - The depth of the top compartment: 0.19" - The depth of the bottom compartment: 0.78" Warm Reminder: Do not recommend using anything other than dry erase markers on the clear top part. Dry erase crayons and "china" markers are waxier and could build up on the clear surface and be harder to clean off completely. You could always test a small mark with these crayons to see how easily it can be removed.

More Details Sturdy & Durable Made from high-impact, break-resistant plastic which is long last and durable and won’t fall apart or break easily after dropping. The sturdy hinge-and-clasp system is designed for years of use and will not fall apart after millions of opens and closes. Dry Erase Convenience, Great for Coaches With dry-erase technology, these clipboards provide you with unlimited writing use while minimizing paper waste. Protect your game plan under protective cover, while allowing players to read it without damaging it. Low-profile Metal Clip & Smooth Writing Keep paperwork from blowing around and won't leave marks on the paper. As a handy lap desk and go mobile to write or draw while at the park or your favorite cafe setting.

Perfect As A Gift Can be used for coaching basketball or other sports, great for coaches to store documents and use as a writing surface.Can be used for work, especially for contractors or outdoor workers, useful for work purposes, including storing documents and pens.Suitable for contractors and outdoor workers, keeps documents protected from rain while working outdoors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coach clipboard.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great clipboard. Coaching 2 soccer teams. It helped keep me organized, has a spot for pens and markers. I really liked the front clear compartment where I printed a soccer field and used it as a whiteboard. Also, very sturdy. It’s a little bulky, but the space is what I was looking for. Great buy !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This clipboard works very well for my Auto Tech class. Makes papers easy to view without them getting dirty while working out in the shop. The pen compartment holds a decent amount of pens also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this color
reviews.reviewText: I'm drive a dump truck and like to stay girlie love the color so vibrant and durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a clipboard with extras!
reviews.reviewText: This is pretty sturdy. I use it every day for school and it hasn't let me down yet.It can carry a nice stack of papers on the large case area and one or two papers in the clear case top area. The clip holds two papers securely. The pencil case at the bottom holds two pencils, two pens and a few paper clips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My clipboard arrived on time. I like everything about it: the color, it holds all my important papers and has a compartment to store my pens, pencils, and markers. I would suggest this to my friends, family, and coworker. 👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The latch broke off and when I snap it back on it stays loose and keeps falling off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my husband for work. He absolutely loves it and he said its very sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and designed
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what I needed. My job requires me to store paper and pens and do alot of sketching. I'm able to fit a surprisingly large about of paper into it and a good number of pencils into the separate pencil holder. I really like the transparent enclosement in front, also separate from main storage area, that holds 10 or so papers that I can view without fear of messing them up. I've had it for a few months and have been pretty rough with tossing it around, piling things on it and dropping it often, but throughout it's held up remarkably well. I will probably but another one down the line and definitely would recommend.
